answers.answer: Just did mine this morning, and now I'm feeling ill and tired. I could hardly finish the drink.
Did it this morning too. Almost Throw up!  Disgusting thing really!
I did mine yesterday morninq it tastes like oranqe qatorade
How mch time it takes to kno d result????Ya it tastes weird.... I fnshd my in a minute... I just drank in one breath..

I did mine 2 weeks ago. I'll find out results tomorrow at my appt. I'm 27 weeks, I'll be 28 weeks on Thursday. Hoping no GD with this pregnancy, I had it with my first and I just had to watch my diet and take my blood sugar levels 3 times a day. Diabetes runs in my family.. so I'll probably have it again.

I had mine yesterday.. got the results this morning. Test came back normal thank goodness. I swore due to how miserable I felt and being over 25 plus very overweight pre pregnancy that I would have it! Im relieved to say the least!

I am doing mine right now and yes it tasted like Orange Gatorade. I drank it in 2 mins and had to wait an hour to give blood. I get my test back on the 24th when I see my OB. It made me extremely tired.

question: Did oral glucose test yesterday... Waiting for the result....
title: who elseeee
